body_html:
@peterjc123 @zou3519 @SsnL, Update on you guys that: the issue seems gone in the latest version (up to commit: 0859f0e). I cannot repo it using my locally built binaries. Looks like an issue in the 0.4.0 version only.

Btw, the version # of my locally built is: 0.5.0a0+0859f0e.

Looking forward to the official pytorch 1.0 release. Cheers!
